item.title: Greegree's/commands [pi]
item.dc:creator: @black_birds0 black birds0
item.description:
@black_birds0 wrote:

place this in wearitem.java between

[QUOTE] c.getPA().emptyPouch(pouch);
return;
}[/QUOTE]

and

[QUOTE]
//c.attackTimer = oldCombatTimer;
c.getItems().wearItem(c.wearId, c.wearSlot);
}

}[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]if(c.wearId == 7927) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“As you put on the ring you turn into an egg!”);
c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 4024) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“you transformed!”);
c.npcId2 = 1459 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 4025) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“you transformed!”);
c.npcId2 = 1481 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 4026) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“you transformed!”);
c.npcId2 = 1482 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 4029) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“you transformed!”);
c.npcId2 = 1465 + Misc.random(5);
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 295) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“As you put on the H’ween amulet you turn into Dracula!”);
c.npcId2 = 757;
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(c.wearId == 6583) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“As you put on the ring you turn into a rock!”);
c.npcId2 = 2626;
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/QUOTE]

place this in commands.java

[QUOTE] if(playerCommand.startsWith(“return”) && c.playerRights == 3) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“return”) && c.playerRights == 2) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“return”) && c.playerRights == 1) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“return”) && c.playerRights == 0) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerCommand.startsWith(“return”) && c.isDonator == 1) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/QUOTE]

Picture on how this would look like

[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/wjz7gn.png[/IMG
